name: 2024 7th International Conference on Big Data Technologies
content: Publication: The accepted papers will be included in ICBDT 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index The ISBN number assigned to ICBDT 2024 is 979-8-4007-1751-2
